thread.title: Republicans hold contest—and the prize is a stay in the Donald Trump-owned hotel
thread.title_full: Republicans hold contest—and the prize is a stay in the Donald Trump-owned hotel

author: rss@dailykos.com (Hunter)
title: Republicans hold contest—and the prize is a stay in the Donald Trump-owned hotel
text:
10 Ha, ethics are for losers. 
No big deal, just the House Republicans holding a contest where the prize is meeting Donald Trump and then getting to stay in the hotel Donald Trump owns . x 
New @NRCC contest for dinner with @POTUS @SpeakerRyan with an overnight stay at the Trump Hotel pic.twitter.com/eXljtq6tl3 — Zeke Miller (@ZekeJMiller) March 13, 2017 
To sum up how this works, Paul Ryan wants you to pay him $10 for a chance to stay in Donald Trump's Washington hotel. House Republicans will then pay Donald Trump's hotel for your stay. The hotel will then keep the profits, which will be deposited directly into Donald Trump's pockets after he stops being president. 
And all of this is "normal" now because Republicans don't give a flying damn whether Trump is making money off his own presidency. Their concerns about "ethics" ended on November 9.
